Back to Johannes Brahms

Johannes Brahms

Canon in F minor, Anh. III/2

1864

Brahms specified neither an instrumentation for the canon nor exactly how it should be realised. The piece works effectively for solo piano. Two realisations are possible; in his edition, Robert Pascall describes the first as the one Brahms probably intended.

Recommended editions

  • Doblinger · Kleine Stücke · ed. Robert Pascall [first realisation]

First realisation

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

Second realisation

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2
